mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_id, userId, product_id, ms, amount) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{product_id}, #{ms}, #{amount})
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where cart_id=#{cart_id}
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(price*amount),0) money from product p join cart c on p.product_id = c.product_id and userId=#{userId}
select product_name, sum(price*amount) money from cart c, product p where c.product_id = p.product_id group by product_name order by product_name
